To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Electrical & Electronic Engineering Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Mechanical Engineering Experience 3 to 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Battery, Storage cell Additional Requirements Proficiency in MS Office, AutoCAD, and maintenance management software.(Preferable) Strong knowledge of electrical and mechanical systems, PLC, drives, motors, pumps, and automation systems. Hands-on experience in troubleshooting electro-mechanical equipment. Familiarity with preventive maintenance systems and tools. Analytical mindset with problem-solving skills. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Responsibilities & Context Plan, execute, and monitor maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair of electro-mechanical systems, machinery, and equipment. Ensure smooth operation of electrical, mechanical, pneumatic, and hydraulic systems in the plant. Assist in installation, commissioning, and testing of new machines, equipment, and automation systems. Develop and implement preventive and predictive maintenance schedules to minimize downtime. Coordinate with vendors, contractors, and suppliers for spare parts and technical support. Ensure compliance with safety, health, and environmental standards in all engineering activities. Support continuous improvement projects to enhance machine efficiency and reduce operational cost. Train and guide junior technicians/operators in handling electro-mechanical systems. job_description: Executive / Senior Executive - Land Related Works (North/South Bengal Districts) : A Reputed Company Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Reputed Company Executive / Senior Executive - Land Related Works (North/South Bengal Districts) Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 05 Age: 25 to 40 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 40 years The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):Land Purchase, mutation, registration, and government liaison with land office, local govt. office, AC Land office, etc. Sound knowledge of Bangladesh land laws, registration processes, and mutation procedures. Strong communication and negotiation skills. Good command of Bengali and English (both written and spoken). Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and basic reporting tools. Smart, dynamic, honest, and able to work under pressure. Candidates with experience working in or with government land offices (Ex-Nayeb, Tahsildar, etc.) will be given priority. Responsibilities & Context Assist in identifying, evaluating, land searching/warish certificate/mutation and purchasing land for company projects. Conduct initial verification of land documents (deed, khatian, porcha, mutation, map, etc.) and ensure proper due diligence. Coordinate with land offices, sub-registrar offices, AC Land, DC offices, and survey departments for mutation, registration, and other official procedures. Maintain updated records and databases of all land-related documents and files. Communicate and negotiate effectively with landowners, brokers, and other stakeholders. Support management during land purchase agreements, registrations, and handovers. Liaise with legal advisors to ensure all land purchases comply with applicable laws and company policies. Visit project sites, verify land boundaries, and assist survey teams when required. Prepare reports, summaries, and presentations on land purchase progress for management. Support the preparation of joint venture or land-sharing agreements as directed. Maintain confidentiality, accuracy, and transparency in all transactions and documentation. Perform any additional tasks assigned by the management. Skills & Expertise Government Liaison Land Mutation Land Purchase Land Verification Land Vetting Liaison With Local Government Registration Compensation & Other Benefits Attractive salary and other admissible benefits as per company policy. Consultation & Referral: She/he shall review all the patient admitted under the Department and will see the referrals as first on call. Daily Follow up & Investigations: She/he shall daily follow up all the patients admitted under the consultant plan their management review the investigations update the consultant on progress of patients. He /She will evaluate the patients requiring bone-marrow transplant. He /She will monitor the patients admitted into the unit for the procedure and do the required monitoring for the same. Procedures: She/he shall perform the procedures of Bone Marrow Aspiration, Biopsy and other hematological procedure. He /She will assist in bone in bone marrow transplant activities. Responsibilities & Context আমাদের সম্পর্কে: [আমরা দীর্ঘ ২৩ বছর ধরে সুনামের সাথে ব্যবসা পরিচালনা করে আসছি,ফিড সেক্টরে আমাদের যথেষ্ট পরিচিতি আছে আলহামদুলিল্লাহ। ] পদের সারসংক্ষেপ: আমরা একজন উদ্যমী এবং দক্ষ সেলস এন্ড মার্কেটিং অফিসার খুঁজছি, যিনি আমাদের ব্যবসার বিক্রয় এবং বিপণন কার্যক্রম তত্ত্বাবধান করবেন। আদর্শ প্রার্থীকে বিক্রয় কৌশল এবং বিপণন পরিকল্পনা তৈরি ও বাস্তবায়নে অভিজ্ঞ হতে হবে, এবং তিনি গ্রাহকদের আকৃষ্ট ও ধরে রাখার কৌশলগত চিন্তাভাবনা করতে সক্ষম হতে হবে। মূল দায়িত্বসমূহ: বিক্রয় পরিচালনা: বিক্রয় কৌশল তৈরি ও বাস্তবায়ন করা এবং বিক্রয় লক্ষ্যমাত্রা অর্জনের জন্য দায়ী থাকা। সম্ভাব্য গ্রাহকদের চিহ্নিত করা এবং নতুন ব্যবসার সুযোগ তৈরি করা। গ্রাহকদের সাথে দৃঢ় সম্পর্ক গড়ে তোলা এবং গ্রাহক সন্তুষ্টি নিশ্চিত করা। বিপণন পরিকল্পনা: বাজার গবেষণা এবং প্রতিযোগিতা বিশ্লেষণের মাধ্যমে কার্যকর বিপণন পরিকল্পনা তৈরি করা। ব্র্যান্ড সচেতনতা এবং বাজারের প্রবণতা বাড়ানোর জন্য বিপণন প্রচারণা ও প্রচারাভিযান পরিচালনা করা। ডিজিটাল বিপণন, সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া এবং অন্যান্য প্ল্যাটফর্মে কোম্পানির উপস্থিতি বাড়ানো। টিম ম্যানেজমেন্ট: বিক্রয় ও বিপণন টিমকে নেতৃত্ব দেওয়া এবং তাদের কাজের তদারকি করা। টিমের কর্মক্ষমতা পর্যবেক্ষণ করা এবং উন্নয়নের জন্য প্রশিক্ষণ ও নির্দেশনা প্রদান করা। বাজেট এবং প্রতিবেদন: বিক্রয় ও বিপণন বাজেট প্রস্তুত ও পরিচালনা করা। বিক্রয় ফলাফল এবং বিপণন কার্যক্রমের কার্যকারিতা পর্যবেক্ষণ এবং বিশ্লেষণ করা। Skills & Expertise Sales & Marketing Suggested by Budget Management Campaign Management Sales Sales & Marketing sales strategy Team Leadership Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Mobile bill Salary Review: Yearly Workplace Work from home,Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Minimum 3–5 years of relevant experience in MIS & WFM, preferably in the BPO or similar industry. Consideration for experience flexibility may be given to candidates with strong domain knowledge and reporting expertise. Proficiency in advanced MS Excel (Power Query, Data Model, Power Pivot, Lookups, Pivot Tables, Dashboards, Charts, etc.) is essential. Experience in other skills like SQL (MS Access, MS SQL, MySQL), Python (Pandas, NumPy), Web Application development (PHP, ASP, JavaScript), and ETL processes will be an added advantage. A basic understanding of generative AI is desirable, particularly in identifying and resolving bottlenecks during development. Proven ability to lead or manage a team for at least 6 months. Solid understanding of contact center KPIs and WFM concepts (e.g., Erlang C, FCR, ACR, Repeat Rate, Occupancy, Productivity, Service Level). Willingness to work on a roster basis and flexibility for extended working hours when required. Responsibilities & Context Manage, develop, and update periodic/ad-hoc reports for both internal and external stakeholders. Ensure timely and error-free report delivery through structured mechanisms. Oversee WFM tasks, including manpower forecasting, shift design, roster planning, and capacity planning for various LOBs. Perform data cleaning, reconciliation, backups, and initiate required automation or process improvements. Prepare performance stack reports covering KPIs and SLAs for agents, team leaders, and process owners. Handle monthly invoice generation, KPI/SLA reports, and payroll data preparation. Develop and maintain various dashboards (e.g., attendance/adherence, absenteeism, productivity, agent performance, quality). Work with large datasets and consolidate data from multiple sources. Lead the MIS team, manage team rosters, and ensure equitable task distribution. Maintain end-to-end control of departmental KPIs, system credentials, File & Web Server/ PC usage, and related policies. Support departmental heads with analytical insights, reports, and process gap identification. Perform any additional tasks assigned by management as required. Attend client and internal meetings, ensuring follow-up and implementation of MIS-related action items. Manage and regularly update attendance, leave, and login hours in the HRMS system. Regularly check and validate all the reports sent

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context Obtain, Analyze and Evaluate Accounting Documentation, Reports, Data, Flowcharts, etc. To Check and verify all Sorts of Transactions, Bill, Voucher etc. Checked Daily Local Purchase Bills, Petty Cash Book, Car maintenance, CNG and Other Fuel Bills. Check Requisition, MRR, Stock Ledger, Gate pass, Challan, Received and Issued Records of Materials Checked Local/Foreign PI/BTB LC of Yarn/Accessories with Approved Budget and Release Acceptance & Maturity as per compliance. Check & Report on all Types of Purchase, Production, Wastage Management. Auditing OT, Tiffin Bill & Unpaid Compensation of the company. C & F and Transport Bill Check with Rate Sheet. Monitor Stock of Raw Materials, WIP, Finished Product & Delivery as per Invoice. To ensure Physical Verification of Cash and Stock as required. To Monitor and Follow up Procurement & MIS. Physical Verification of Inventory and Fixed Assets Quarterly, Half yearly & annually. Check Monthly Financial Statement (Management Report). Follow up MRS (Return Challan) Checking for whether the Item Bill Paid or not Identify Loopholes and Recommend Risk Mitigate Measures and Cost Savings. To Prepare Audit Findings Report with necessary analysis and comparison and Submit to MD. Any other requirement needed by Management. Trade Marketing Executive : Beautyology Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Beautyology Trade Marketing Executive Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka (Banani) Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements 1–3 years of experience in trade marketing, brand activation, or sales support (beauty, skincare, or FMCG industry preferred). Strong understanding of retail marketing, promotions, and in-store execution . Excellent communication and presentation skills. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales and market data. Ability to manage multiple campaigns and deadlines simultaneously . Proactive, creative, and results-driven with strong team collaboration skills . Responsibilities & Context About Beautyology Beautyology is one of Bangladesh’s fastest-growing skincare and wellness brands, known for its innovation, professionalism, and customer-first values.With a strong national footprint and rapidly expanding product portfolio, we are setting new benchmarks in the beauty and lifestyle industry through quality, performance, and teamwork.Our greatest strength lies in our people — the talent and dedication behind every milestone we achieve. Why Join Beautyology? At Beautyology, you’ll join a progressive, performance-oriented culture where ideas matter and teamwork drives success. We value efficiency, discipline, and continuous improvement, empowering our employees to grow both personally and professionally in a supportive environment. Position Overview The Trade Marketing Executive will be responsible for implementing trade marketing strategies, coordinating with sales and marketing teams, and executing promotional activities in retail stores, clinics, and partner outlets. The role requires strong analytical skills, creativity, and the ability to manage multiple projects to drive brand visibility and revenue growth. Key Responsibilities Plan and execute trade marketing campaigns to drive product awareness and sales in retail and partner channels. Collaborate with sales teams to develop promotional materials, in-store displays, and POS activities . Monitor and analyze retail performance, competitor activities, and market trends . Coordinate with marketing and creative teams to design campaign visuals, brochures, and digital support materials . Track the effectiveness of trade promotions and provide reports with actionable insights. Support product launches, special offers, and seasonal campaigns . Maintain strong relationships with distributors, retailers, and partner clinics . Ensure brand guidelines are implemented consistently across all trade marketing activities. Skills & Expertise Trade Marketing Suggested

job_title: প্রধান হিসাব রক্ষক (Microfinance)- দারিদ্র বিমোচন প্রোগ্রাম (ডিবিপি)
job_description:
প্রধান হিসাব রক্ষক (Microfinance)- দারিদ্র বিমোচন প্রোগ্রাম (ডিবিপি) : United Trust (UT) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List United Trust (UT) প্রধান হিসাব রক্ষক (Microfinance)- দারিদ্র বিমোচন প্রোগ্রাম (ডিবিপি) Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 30 to 40 years Location: Jamalpur (Melandaha) Salary: Tk. 25000 - 30000 (Monthly) Published: 20 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 30 to 40 years অধিক যোগ্যতা সম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের ক্ষেত্রে শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতা শিথিলযোগ্য ও বেতন আলোচনা সাপেক্ষে নির্ধারণ করা হবে। Experience: At least 5 years in Accounting Job The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Working in Group of Companies, Micro-Credit প্রার্থীর অভিজ্ঞতা: মাইক্রোক্রেডিট বিভাগে ন্যূনতম ৫ বছরের বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। হিসাবরক্ষণ ও আর্থিক ব্যবস্থাপনা সম্পর্কিত কাজে অভিজ্ঞ প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেয়া হবে। অতিরিক্ত দক্ষতা: এমএস অফিস ও বিশেষ করে এক্সেল-এ দক্ষতা। মাইক্রোক্রেডিট সংক্রান্ত হিসাবরক্ষণে ব্যবহারিক জ্ঞানদায়িত্বশীল, সতর্ক এবং টিমে কাজ করার মানসিকতা। মাইক্রোফাইন্যন্স সফটওয়্যার ব্যবহারের অভিজ্ঞতা। Responsibilities & Context Company In Brief: United Trust (UT), established in 2010 and registered in 2011 (Reg. No. 1359), is the social welfare wing of the United Group with strategic focus in the areas of Education, Health, Poverty Alleviation, and Community Development Services. Our flagship initiative, Daridro Bimochon Program (DBP), provides interest-free micro-credit to rural women, marginal farmers, and micro-entrepreneurs. With a loan portfolio of BDT 32 crore and a 96% recovery rate. DBP has already empowered over 30,000 families at 4 districts under 2 Arears (Jamalpur and Kishoreganj) through 16 branches. মূল দায়িত্বসমূহ: ডিবিপি প্রধান কার্যালয়ের সকল হিসাবরক্ষণ কার্যক্রম সঠিকভাবে পরিচালনা করা। লেজার, ভাউচার, ক্যাশবুক, ব্যালেন্স শিট ও আর্থিক প্রতিবেদন প্রস্তুত করা প্রতিষ্ঠানের আর্থিক নীতিমালা অনুসরণ করে হিসাব যাচাই ও সমন্বয় করা সংশ্লিষ্ট বিভাগের সাথে সমন্বয় করে আর্থিক তথ্য সংগ্রহ ও উপস্থাপন করা Skills & Expertise Microcredit Microfianance microfin360 Compensation & Other Benefits শিক্ষানবিশকাল ৬ মাস। শিক্ষানবিশকাল শেষে মাসিক বেতন হবে ২৫০০০ থেকে ৩০০০০ টাকা /সংস্থার নিয়মিত বেতন কাঠামো অনুযায়ী নির্ধারিত হবে।
অন্যান্য সুবিধাঃ বার্ষিক ইনক্রিমেন্ট, ২টি উৎসব বোনাস, লাঞ্চ ভাতা, মোবাইল ভাতা, মোটরসাইকেল জ্বালানি ও রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ ভাতা, প্রভিডেন্ট ফান্ড ও বর্গা গরু বিক্রয়ে স্টাফ প্রফিট শেয়ারিং। Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Responsibilities & Context A leading Agro Chemical (Crop Protection Products, Fertilizers, Seeds) Company established in 1969, having its marketing network throughout the country (13 Regional Offices and warehouses) and well-equipped pesticide formulation plant situated in Gazipur, is looking for dynamic, dedicated, individuals for the above position to serve with this company or any of her sister concern. Responsibilities: To maintain Daily Cash Book, Bank Book, General Ledger, Customer & Vendor Ledger and Journal record properly. To check and ensure that suppliers’ payment is accurate and all payment are properly authorized and ensure periodic balance confirmation for Accounts Payable. Ensure periodic balance confirmation for Accounts Receivable and Credit Monitoring & Credit Control. Perform cash flow forecasting, Monthly receipt & payment and treasury management. Perform Bank Reconciliation, Intercompany reconciliation and resolve discrepancies. Perform Inventory reconciliation with Headquarter, Factory & Regional Warehouse. To prepare various report like Monthly Sales, Purchase, Production, Inventory & Bank liabilities. To make calculations and according to declared sales incentive program. Communicate with Bank, Govt. authorities and any other related organizations as and when required. Conduct Factory & Regional Offices’ Audit and submit financial & Non-financial audit report based on audit observations. To Assist in the preparation of Financial Statement

We are seeking a smart, energetic, and ambitious Female Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will handle client communications, fix meetings, and manage sales operations for our Real Estate division. This role requires a high level of professionalism as you will be dealing with VIP clients. Office Hours: 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM. Office Address: Lotus Kamal Tower - 2, Level 10, Room Number: 10, Plot No.: 59 & 61, Gulshan South Avenue, Gulshan 1, Dhaka 1212. Job Responsibilities: Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest. Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team. VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance. Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets. Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email. Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management. Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales. Additional Requirements: Communication Skills: Must have fluent communication skills in both Bangla & English with a clear and confident voice. Appearance: Must be smart, good-looking, and well-groomed/presentable (essential for interacting with high-profile clients). Attitude: Must be energetic, target-oriented, and hardworking. Flexibility: Must have the mentality to work extra hours occasionally outside of standard office time if required by the business or for urgent client meetings. Tech Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel), Email drafting, and WhatsApp communication is required. Skills & Expertise Business Communication Client Relationship Manageme

শাখার লক্ষ্য মাত্রানুযায়ী গ্রুফ গঠন, প্রশিক্ষণ, কেন্দ্র মিটিং, গ্রুপ স্বীকৃতি, ঋণ বিতরন, ঋণ ও সঞ্চয় আদায় এবং প্রয়োজনে এগুলো পর্যালোচনা করা; মাঠকর্মকর্তা/সহ:হিসাবরক্ষক গণকে সংস্থার নীতিমালা ও প্রক্রিয়া সম্পর্কে যথেষ্ট ওয়াকেবহাল তা নিশ্চিত করা; এরিয়া ম্যানেজার ও প্রোগ্রাম অফিসারের সঙ্গে সমন্বয় রক্ষা করা; প্রাথমিক দলীয় তালিকা পর্যালোচনা করা এবং Feedback দেওয়া; দলীয় সদস্যদের বাড়ী পরিদর্শন করে তাদের Well-being অবস্থা জানা; সদস্যদের সংস্থার নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী সদস্যপদ অনুমোদন দেয়া; ঋণের জন্য আবেদনকারীর দেয়া তথ্য বাড়ী পরিদর্শন করে যাচাই করা; এরিয়া ম্যানেজারের নিকট অনুমোদনের জন্য ঋণের আবেদন পত্র জমা দেয়া; প্রত্যেক ঋণ

Technical Officer : Arannayk Foundation Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Arannayk Foundation Technical Officer Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Location: Bandarban Salary: Tk. 47400 - 50244 (Monthly) Published: 10 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context Arannayk Foundation, also known as the Bangladesh Tropical Forest Conservation Foundation, is a not-for-profit organization established in 2003 through a joint initiative of the Governments of Bangladesh and the United States. Registered under Section 28 of the Bangladesh Companies Act 1994, it promotes the conservation, protection, restoration, and sustainable use of tropical forests across the country. The Foundation provides both financial and technical assistance to various stakeholders engaged in forest and biodiversity conservation, while also implementing projects funded by national and international development partners. The Arannayk Foundation is now implementing the IUCN-funded, 30-month project (July 2025–December 2027) titled “Beyond Border: Securing Big Cats and Their Habitats across the Chittagong–Lushai Transboundary Landscape of Bangladesh and India”, to secure clouded leopards and common leopards in the Chittagong-Lushai transboundary landscape of Bangladesh and India. Through scientific monitoring, habitat restoration, and community partnerships, the project reduces threats to big cats, prey, and corridors while delivering sustainable livelihoods to local communities in the Chittagong Hill Tracts. We invite passionate professionals to join our team as a Technical Officer to make a real impact in this vital conservation effort. This position is subject to fulfillment of other criteria as mentioned in detail advertisement, and local candidates having language skills in the local dialect of Rangamati / Bandarban areas and willing to work and stay at the remote project sites, will be given preference and are encouraged to apply. Registered under Section 28 of the Bangladesh Companies Act 1994, it promotes the conservation, protection, restoration, and sustainable use of tropical forests across the country. The Foundation provides both financial and technical assistance to various stakeholders engaged in forest and biodiversity conservation, while also implementing projects funded by national and international development partners. The Arannayk Foundation is now implementing the IUCN-funded, 30-month project (July 2025–December 2027) titled “Beyond Border: Securing Big Cats and Their Habitats across the Chittagong–Lushai Transboundary Landscape of Bangladesh and India”, to secure clouded leopards and common leopards in the Chittagong-Lushai transboundary landscape of Bangladesh and India. Through scientific monitoring, habitat restoration, and community partnerships, the project reduces threats to big cats, prey, and corridors while delivering sustainable livelihoods to local communities in the Chittagong Hill Tracts. We invite passionate professionals to join our team as an Accounts and Admin Officer to make a real impact in this vital conservation effort. This position is subject to fulfillment of other criteria as mentioned in detail advertisement, and local candidates having language skills in the local dialect of Rangamati / Bandarban areas and willing to work and stay at the remote project sites, will be given preference and are encouraged to apply. দরখাস্ত এবং সিভি (জীবন-বৃত্তান্ত) মোবাইল নম্বরসহ সদ্য তোলা ২ কপি ছবি, নাগরিকত্ব সনদ, জাতীয় পরিচয়পত্র ও শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতার সকল সনদপত্রের ফটোকপি, কাজের অভিজ্ঞতা সনদের ফটোকপি সংযুক্ত করতে হবে। কেবলমাত্র বাছাইকৃত প্রার্থীদেরকেই নিয়োগ পরীক্ষায় অংশগ্রহণের জন্য ডাকা হবে। সকল পরীক্ষায় কমপক্ষে জিপিএ ২.৫ থাকতে হবে। কর্তৃপক্ষ যে কোন দরখাস্ত বাতিল করার ক্ষমতা সংরক্ষন করে। কোন প্রকার তদবীর প্রার্থীর অযোগ্যতা হিসেবে বিবেচিত হবে। সুপার শপরে র্সাবকি ব্যবস্থপনা ও তত্ত্বাবধান। বিক্রয় বৃদ্ধি ও কাস্টমার সার্ভিস উন্নয়নে কার্যকর পদক্ষপে গ্রহণ। স্টক ম্যানজেমন্টে, সাপ্লাই চেইন ও কর্মী ব্যবস্থপনা এবং মার্কেট  সার্ভে ও প্রতিযোগী বিশ্লেষণ করা হয়। মাসিক রিপোর্ট প্রস্তুত ও কর্তৃপক্ষকে উপস্থাপন। ম্যানেজমেন্টের নির্দেশনা অনুযায়ী অন্যান্য কাজ সম্পাদন। প্রতির্ষ্ঠানের নীতি ও লক্ষ্য বাস্তবায়ন নিশ্চিত করা। বিঃ দ্রঃ এ নিয়োগ job_description: Logistics Associate (Billing & Reconciliation), SC6, Cox`s Bazar : United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) Logistics Associate (Billing & Reconciliation), SC6, Cox`s Bazar Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Cox`s Bazar Published: 14 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Experience: At least 6 years of overall experience in areas related to Supply Chain or other relevant fields. Language: Fluency in spoken and written both in English and Bangla language. Responsibilities & Context Grade: SC6 Type of contract: Service Contract Duration: 12 Months WFP celebrates and embraces diversity. It is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all its employees and encourages qualified candidates to apply irrespective of race, colour, national origin, ethnic or social background, genetic information, gender, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, religion or belief, HIV status or disability. ABOUT WFP The World Food Programme is the world’s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change. At WFP, people are at the heart of everything we do and the vision of the future WFP workforce is one of diverse, committed, skilled, and high performing teams, selected on merit, operating in a healthy and inclusive work environment, living WFP`s values (Integrity, Collaboration, Commitment, Humanity, and Inclusion) and working with partners to save and change the lives of those WFP serves. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES (not all-inclusive, nor exhaustive): Lead the processing of financial and administrative tasks to ensure effective and timely management of Supply Chain resources. Manage retailer invoice workflows by receiving, reviewing, validating, and submitting invoices to the Finance Unit within agreed timelines, and follow up on payment processes to ensure adherence to schedules. Coordinate the timely collection of reconciliation reports and supporting documentation from retailers, cooperating partners, and internal units; ensure the reconciliation team consistently follows up to maintain monthly cycles. Prepare, consolidate, and circulate monthly reconciliation reports to relevant stakeholders. Maintain regular sales data from contracted retailers, conduct basic analysis of commodity wise sales volumes, and use findings to inform operational planning and market performance assessments. Monitor the performance of contracting retailers, oversee shop expansion, and adapt supply chain operation

Responsibilities & Context Grade: SC6 Type of contract: Service Contract Duration: 12 Months WFP celebrates and embraces diversity. It is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all its employees and encourages qualified candidates to apply irrespective of race, colour, national origin, ethnic or social background, genetic information, gender, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, religion or belief, HIV status or disability. ABOUT WFP The World Food Programme is the world’s largest humanitarian organization saving lives in emergencies and using food assistance to build a pathway to peace, stability and prosperity, for people recovering from conflict, disasters and the impact of climate change. At WFP, people are at the heart of everything we do and the vision of the future WFP workforce is one of diverse, committed, skilled, and high performing teams, selected on merit, operating in a healthy and inclusive work environment, living WFP`s values (Integrity, Collaboration, Commitment, Humanity, and Inclusion) and working with partners to save and change the lives of those WFP serves. BACKGROUND AND PURPOSE OF THE ASSIGNMENT To perform specialized and/or standardized policy and programme-related processes and activities to support the effective delivery of assistance packages. KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES (not all-inclusive, within delegated authority): Under the direct supervision of the Programme Officer this position will be responsible for the following duties: Programme Implementation Support Assist the School Feeding Programme Officer in implementing school feeding activities in Cox’s Bazar. Provide technical assistance to local government education offices, schools, and teachers to ensure effective delivery of programme activities. Responsibilities & Context We are looking for a proactive professional to streamline our cement delivery operations across various depots, ghats, and our head office. A deep understanding of regional logistics and the ability to respond quickly to site-specific challenges are essential for this role. Therefore, candidates who are permanent residents of the required location will be given high priority. We value local expertise, as it ensures better coordination with regional transport networks and more efficient onsite management. Job Responsibilities: Collect sales orders and create delivery plans using ERP/CRM systems. Coordinate dispatches using company-owned or customer-provided trucks. Prepare and verify invoices, challans, and dispatch documents. Monitor and reconcile stock levels regularly at the depot/ghat. Ensure proper stacking and FIFO handling. Liaise with transporters and vendors to ensure vehicle availability and smooth dispatch operations. Verify vendor bills and submit them to the Distribution Accounts Department for payment. Communicate regularly with the sales team and head office to ensure timely deliveries. Handle dealer/customer queries and coordinate delivery schedules accordingly. Ensure compliance with company policies, legal regulations, and safety standards. Submit daily/weekly MIS reports and report any operational issues, stock losses, or damages.
